channel.title: Project GnomeScape - The skilling millenium!
channel.description:
You know those servers where it says "skilling server!", and then when you download the client which takes 10 minutes, then log in, oh wait, I need to register on the forums first and activate my account! (another 10 mins...) Then you log on, you walk around the server and explore (5 mins) and you find out that it's mostly pking?
Congratulations, You just wasted 25 minutes of your life!
I just hate that...
This server just transforms extreme pking into extreme skilling!
GnomeScape will have very basic combat, meaning there's really no point in combat unless you really want to train it, and this also means that the skilling will be AMAZING.
[b]I AM USING SHARD REVOLUTIONS AS MY BASE![/b]
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Goals:
A - Finished! B - Started and progressing C - Not Started D - Will not start unless requested by many people
--------
Combat - A (Just no specials, probably won't add unless requested by many people)
Prayer - C Non-CB Magic - C RC - C Agil - C (This should be a fun one :D) Herb - C Thieve - B Craft - C Fletching - A Slayer - D Mining - A Smithing - C Fishing - A Cooking - A Firemaking - C WC - A Farming - C -----------------------
I know there's A LOT of C's, but I will be updating this list. I'm going to take my time with each and every skill, adding the perfect touch. Now for the economy.
You may ask "What's an economy without pking?"
You DO NOT NEED pking to make a great economy. Take RSC for example, in the early days of RSC, it didn't have wildy, and it had a pretty good economy. Even if there was NPCS. In GnomeScape, the economy WILL BE skilling. I include this into the custom items section.
CUSTOM ITEMS
I know that MANY people HATE items like "Purple Dharoks", and I hate them too. I will aim for this server to be creative, although not get "Purple Dharoks" because we all know items like that ruin the server. The items will help skillers of all levels.
Runescape - Whenever a new skilling item comes out in Runescape, I will work as quick as possible to try to get it into my server.
DO NOT think that the server will have GAY custom items like purple flax or something, we will try to aim for a nice, smooth, and realistic private server.
Now so that this doesn't get locked, here's a picture of fishing working 100%:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25r03g6.jpg[/img]
Smexy much :)
___________________________________________________________________________________
Here's the OTHER progress:
Client - 0% Forum - 0%
I'll start working on the forum soon, and the client I might need help with, because I really SUCK at client coding.
That's all for now, I hope you support this project. If you do, please take the time to put this in your signature:
[u][b]I support GnomeScape - The skilling millenium![/b][/u]
Thanks,
Pk3r John

I suggest you get a suitable name, becasue the one you got now is more of a pking one and doesnt match the development.[/quote]

I’l change it.

item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

You know those servers where it says “skilling server!”, and then when you download the client which takes 10 minutes, then log in, oh wait, I need to register on the forums first and activate my account! B - Started and progressing

Herb - C

Craft - C
Fletching - A
Slayer - D
Mining - A

Fishing - A

Firemaking - C
WC - A
Farming - C

I know there’s A LOT of C’s, but I will be updating this list. I’m going to take my time with each and every skill, adding the perfect touch.
Now for the economy.

You may ask “What’s an economy without pking?”

You DO NOT NEED pking to make a great economy. Take RSC for example, in the early days of RSC, it didn’t have wildy, and it had a pretty good economy. Even if there was NPCS.
In GnomeScape, the economy WILL BE skilling. I include this into the custom items section.

I know that MANY people HATE items like “Purple Dharoks”, and I hate them too. I will aim for this server to be creative, although not get “Purple Dharoks” because we all know items like that ruin the server.
The items will help skillers of all levels.

Runescape -
Whenever a new skilling item comes out in Runescape, I will work as quick as possible to try to get it into my server.

DO NOT think that the server will have GAY custom items like purple flax or something, we will try to aim for a nice, smooth, and realistic private server.

Smexy much

Here’s the OTHER progress:

I’ll start working on the forum soon, and the client I might need help with, because I really SUCK at client coding.

That’s all for now, I hope you support this project.

I support GnomeScape - The skilling millenium!
